subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. says a brief clip shows defensive tackle Anthony Hargrove referring to bounty money on the sideline during a game; a lawyer for the players union contends it does not.
snippet: The N.F.L. says a brief clip shows defensive tackle Anthony Hargrove referring to bounty money on the sideline during a game; a lawyer for the players union contends it does not.
